Example flows:
• Pew manufacturers → Churches → Refuge Chapel grants.
• PHAs → Workforce housing → Developer fee revenue.
• Farmers/realtors → Mapping program → Compliance and verification tools.
Action Items
1. Build segmented contact databases for each product line.
2. Create automated CRM processes for follow-up.
3. Track referral pathways to identify which partners generate the most leads.

6. Appendices (Placeholders)
Appendices will contain detailed reference material, technical specifications, patents, and
expanded contact lists.
Planned appendices:
A. Mapping Program Technical Documentation
B. Patents and Provisional Patent Filings
C. Target PHA Shortlist
D. Pew Manufacturer Contact List
